TechStackPage.methodDescription: I optimize for predictable delivery: clear architecture, reusable design systems, measurable performance, and collaboration-friendly code.

AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.intro: I'm a passionate front-end developer with a focus on creating intuitive and engaging user experiences. My goal is to build products that are not only visually appealing but also highly functional and accessible.
AboutPage.aboutMeDescription: I'm a front-end developer with 3+ years of experience in building web applications using modern technologies like React. I have a strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I'm always eager to learn new frameworks and libraries. My development philosophy centers around clean, maintainable code and a user-first approach. I believe that great design is not just about aesthetics but also about usability and accessibility. I strive to create products that are both beautiful and easy to use for everyone.

2026.title: Portfolio rebuild and narrative-driven architecture
2026.description: Redesigned this portfolio around story-first sections, tokenized theming, and stronger international UX consistency.

2025.title: Product-focused frontend delivery
2025.description: Built and shipped multiple product interfaces with improved filtering, modal flows, and maintainable component boundaries.

2024.title: Foundation in modern React ecosystem
2024.description: Expanded expertise in React, Next.js, and TypeScript with a strong emphasis on accessibility and performance.

product.title: Solve product problems first
product.description: Start from user and business goals, then select the simplest implementation that can scale.

craft.title: Design and code as one system
craft.description: Build reusable UI primitives and design tokens so consistency improves as features grow.

team.title: Communicate with clarity
team.description: Prefer explicit naming, predictable structures, and documentation-ready code for fast team onboarding.
